querystring.select: SELECT SOVEN.EMP_NAME AS SalesOfficer, A.SALES_NOTES AS SalesNotes, SSVEN.EMP_NAME AS SalesSpv, SRRM.DESCR AS SalesRecommend
querystring.from: FROM dbo.APP A WITH(NOLOCK) LEFT JOIN dbo.V_EMP_NAME SOVEN WITH(NOLOCK) ON A.SALES_OFFICER_NO = SOVEN.EMP_NO LEFT JOIN dbo.V_EMP_NAME SSVEN WITH(NOLOCK) ON A.SALES_HEAD_NO = SSVEN.EMP_NO LEFT JOIN dbo.V_REF_MASTER SRRM WITH(NOLOCK) ON A.MR_SALES_RECOMMEND_CODE = SRRM.MASTER_CODE AND SRRM.REF_MASTER_TYPE_CODE='SLS_RECOM'

querystring.select: SELECT RAS.APP_SRC_NAME AS AppSource, FITRM.DESCR AS FirstInstType, A.TENOR AS Tenor, ITRM.DESCR AS InterestType, RPF.DESCR AS PayFreq, A.NUM_OF_INST AS NumOfInst, ISRM.DESCR AS InstScheme, CNORM.DESCR AS CustNotifyOpt, WRM.DESCR AS Wop, FPPF.DESCR AS FloatingPeriod, MC.MOU_CUST_NO AS MouCustNo, A.MOU_CUST_ID AS MouCustId, SICMC.DESCR AS InstallmentCalculationMethod, ITC.DESCR AS InstallmentType, TB.DESCR AS TopBased
querystring.from: FROM dbo.APP A WITH(NOLOCK) INNER JOIN dbo.APP_FIN_DATA AFD WITH(NOLOCK) on A.APP_ID = AFD.APP_ID LEFT JOIN dbo.APP_FCTR appFctr ON appFctr.APP_ID = A.APP_ID LEFT JOIN dbo.V_REF_MASTER FITRM WITH(NOLOCK) ON A.MR_FIRST_INST_TYPE_CODE = FITRM.MASTER_CODE AND FITRM.REF_MASTER_TYPE_CODE='FIRST_INST_TYPE'  LEFT JOIN dbo.V_REF_MASTER ITRM WITH(NOLOCK) ON AFD.INTEREST_TYPE = ITRM.MASTER_CODE AND ITRM.REF_MASTER_TYPE_CODE='INTRSTTYPE' LEFT JOIN dbo.V_REF_MASTER ISRM WITH(NOLOCK) ON AFD.MR_INST_SCHEME_CODE = ISRM.MASTER_CODE AND ISRM.REF_MASTER_TYPE_CODE='INST_SCHM' LEFT JOIN dbo.V_REF_MASTER CNORM WITH(NOLOCK) ON A.MR_CUST_NOTIFY_OPT_CODE = CNORM.MASTER_CODE AND CNORM.REF_MASTER_TYPE_CODE='CUST_NOTIF_OPT' LEFT JOIN dbo.V_REF_MASTER WRM WITH(NOLOCK) ON A.MR_WOP_CODE = WRM.MASTER_CODE AND WRM.REF_MASTER_TYPE_CODE='WOP' LEFT JOIN dbo.V_REF_MASTER SICMC WITH(NOLOCK) ON appFctr.MR_SINGLE_INST_CALC_MTHD_CODE = SICMC.MASTER_CODE AND SICMC.REF_MASTER_TYPE_CODE='SINGLE_INST_CALC_METHOD' LEFT JOIN dbo.V_REF_MASTER ITC WITH(NOLOCK) ON appFctr.MR_INST_TYPE_CODE = ITC.MASTER_CODE AND ITC.REF_MASTER_TYPE_CODE='INST_TYPE' LEFT JOIN dbo.V_REF_MASTER TB WITH(NOLOCK) ON appFctr.TOP_BASED = TB.MASTER_CODE AND TB.REF_MASTER_TYPE_CODE='TOP_CALC_BASED' LEFT JOIN dbo.V_REF_PAY_FREQ RPF WITH(NOLOCK) ON A.PAY_FREQ_CODE = RPF.PAY_FREQ_CODE LEFT JOIN dbo.REF_APP_SRC RAS WITH(NOLOCK) ON A.MR_APP_SOURCE_CODE = RAS.APP_SRC_CODE LEFT JOIN dbo.V_REF_PAY_FREQ FPPF WITH(NOLOCK) ON A.FLOATING_PERIOD_CODE = FPPF.PAY_FREQ_CODE LEFT JOIN dbo.MOU_CUST MC WITH(NOLOCK) ON MC.MOU_CUST_ID = A.MOU_CUST_ID
